Dry John Toilet Bags provide a perfect resource for disposing of your waste in an eco-friendly manner.

Dry John News

Most Recent Post

The Huron Lighthouse - built in 1939

March 18, 2021

Built in 1939, the Huron, Ohio lighthouse construction resembles that of ships built at the time, with riveted steel connections. It’s taken a pounding over the decades and still looks great and solid! Picture taken at dawn on 3/18/21.

by: Pete Phinney

About Dry John

"I try and live what I say. I want the world to be a less polluted place. That’s a tall order. But if more of us do just a little bit more I believe we can make a noticeable difference. I take joy in knowing that for every Dry John toilet bag used, there is one less dose of human waste on the ground or in the water. Thank you so much for pitching in and helping make a difference! Sincerely, Pete Phinney" - founder of Dry John, LLC
